com.glyart.mystral.datasource

Interface DataSourceFactory<T extends DataSource>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the DataSource type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HikariFactory
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DataSourceFactory<T extends DataSource>
    Convenient interface for lazily creating DataSource objects. This interface exposes the newDataSource() method, which inits the DataSource.

    Knowing this, implementations must call newDataSource() when it's all set.

    This interface can be used to create any datasource which supports a property-based configuration.

    See Also:
    DataSource, HikariFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TEMPLATE_URL
      Represents a basic template url for creating a jdbc url.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T newDataSource()
      If ready, a new DataSource is created with its configuration.

    • Field Detail

      • TEMPLATE_URL

        static final String TEMPLATE_URL
        Represents a basic template url for creating a jdbc url.
        The structure is jdbc:<dbms-name>://<host>:<port>/<schema>
        More info here.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • newDataSource

        @NotNull
T newDataSource()
                   throws DataSourceInitException
        If ready, a new DataSource is created with its configuration.
        Returns:
        the DataSource
        Throws:
        DataSourceInitException - if something went wrong
